name: JasonWaters
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
My name is Jason Waters, a Motivational Speaker/Author with a strong history of combining detailed research, humor and motivation to help individuals and teams overcome fear and make positive changes in their lives.

Delivering speeches and keynote presentations to challenge and transform my listeners is my passion! As a Keynote Speaker, I inspire my audience to take some risks, some action, set goals and execute their plans. I am passionate about assisting people and institutions to draw strength from within and realize their potential with proven strategies.
